text: "The Distance" is a 1996 song by American band Cake. It is the leading single from their second studio album Fashion Nugget. It went to number 22 in the United Kingdom, number 20 in Scotland and number 21 in Australia. It did not chart in New Zealand. ==Track listing== # "The Distance" – 3:00 # "Multiply the Heartaches" – 2:49 # "Jolene" (live) – 8:25 # "It's Coming Down" – 3:44 ==References== Category:1996 songs Category:Cake (band) songs Category:Pop rock songs Category:Rap rock songs
title: The Distance (Cake song)
